title: Bug 47910ajc outjar jarfile does not contain MANIFEST.MF
OB: When using the 'ajc' command with the 'outjar' parameter, a jar file is created without a MANIFEST.MF file. The resulting file has a .jar extension, but it is not a valid jar file due to the absence of MANIFEST.MF.
EB: The 'ajc' command with the 'outjar' parameter should create a valid jar file that includes a MANIFEST.MF file.
SR: To reproduce the issue, execute the following command: ajc sourceroots <mydir outjar <my.jar
